term.title: Rydberg orbital

item.text: For an atom, an orbital with principal quantum number greater than that of any occupied orbital of the ground state. For a molecular entity, a molecular orbital which correlates with a Rydberg atomic orbital in an atomic fragment produced by dissociation. Typically, the extension of the Rydberg orbital is large compared to the size of the atom or molecular entity.
